timeline.message: Fixed a crash from occurring when an empty string is provided
Fixed formatting and added some comments

timeline.bodyText:
Format is not ok, check your settings.
See https://documentation.gxf.lfenergy.org/Opensourcecommunity/ToolsguidelinesCI.html
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.bodyText:
Move comment above the assertion or use withFailMessage.
Goes for other methods as well.
timeline.author: robindenadel

timeline.message:
Applied formatting & Moved dependency to super pom

As per Robin's feedback the mockito core dependency now inherits the version of the super pom.xml. And, the mockito inline dependency has been added to the super pom.xml.

Increased branch coverage, removed unnecessary conditions & dependency

Also reduced convolutedness of testGetDateTime
